body_html:
It appears that the MatMul operation takes a really long time since my test data size is longer than the training data batch size. (Training data is 100 example at each run while test is 3800 examples)

The question is why is sharing variables causing this size of a test data run to take so long as compared to utilizing place holders and not using variables scope sharing.

Also important to note that overall with the smaller test batch size and variable sharing I'm still seeing about 100ms per run compared to 75ms per run with placeholders and a longer test size batch (3800 examples).

But that's not as bad as my main problem which is 1000ms vs about 100ms

The question is why is sharing variables causing this size of a test data run to take so long as compared to utilizing place holders and not using variables scope sharing. 

Also important to note that overall with the smaller test batch size and variable sharing I'm still seeing about 100ms per run compared to 75ms per run with placeholders and a longer test size batch (3800 examples). 

But that's not as bad as my main problem which is 1000ms vs about 100ms
